/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a bustling construction site in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a street-level view, looking towards the site. The sky above is a clear blue, and the sun is shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. 

In the distance, several tall buildings are under construction, their skeletal structures reaching towards the sky. Among them, a crane stands out, a testament to the ongoing development. The buildings are surrounded by lush greenery, providing a stark contrast to the urban structures. 

The road leading to the construction site is lined with trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the crane, making them appear even more imposing. 

Despite the absence of people in the image, the presence of the crane and the ongoing construction work suggest a hive of activity just out of frame. The image is a snapshot of a city in progress, constantly evolving and growing.
